summary.span: 为 Windows 工具栏对象提供容器。

span.span: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 、 和 的基类。 is the base class for , , and . 使用及其关联类在新的 Windows 窗体应用程序中创建工具栏可以拥有 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自定义外观和行为，以期或主题，而无需具有溢出和运行时项目的支持重新排序。Use and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering. 控件还提供丰富的设计时体验，包括在就地激活和编辑、 自定义布局和共享中指定的水平或垂直空间。 controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified . 类提供了很多管理的绘制、 鼠标和键盘输入和拖放功能的成员。The class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality. 使用类，该类具有类，以获得更多控制和自定义与所有的绘制和布局样式Windows 窗体上的控件。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all controls on a Windows Form. 以下各项专门用于与都无缝配合和中所有的方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 会在设计时按默认提供的控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - - - - 可以加入内指定的控件和合并与每个其他控件。You can join controls within a specified and merge controls with each other. 使用而非对于多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。Use rather than for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 通常情况下，除非它绝对定位的而不停靠或在不参与的 tab 键顺序。Typically, a does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a . 使用类来承载在任何其他 Windows 窗体控件。Use the class to host any other Windows Forms control in a . 默认情况下，进行双缓冲，利用设置。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加和向 Windows 窗体，将项添加到，并将添加到的。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`并设置属性`false`响应已定义中的拖放行为， ，和事件。Set the property to `true` and set the property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the , , and events. 设置到`false`并设置到`true`导致类来处理拖放和项自动重新排序。Set to `false` and set to `true` to cause the class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically. 设置到`true`两个对象以允许从一台拖动项相互。Set to `true` for two objects to allow dragging of items from one to the other. 若要启用默认拖放，必须在拖动操作期间按 ALT 键。To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation. 同时设置和到`true`引发异常。Setting both and to `true` throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 锚定到其父控件的控件，可确保时调整父控件的锚定的边缘保留在父控件的同一位置相对于边缘。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. > [!NOTE] > 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. value.span: 如果控件调整宽度以完整显示内容，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置到`false`和嵌入在面板的边界移动时不会进行转换到不同的面板。If you set to `false` and the is embedded in a panel, the bounds of the are not translated when you move the to a different panel of the . 若要正确转换边界，同步事件，检查的值属性及调整大小。To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the event, check the value of the property, and resize the . ， ， ， ，和属性与图像处理的各个方面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间属性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only property. 图像缩放由属性中的交互和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例设置和容器的设置。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（默认值） 和是，会发生任何图像缩放，和大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`和是，既不映像也不会进行缩放。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义如何调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，设置到导致将其自身对齐其父控件的左边缘和根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件停靠在其 z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 如果控件处于、内可重新定位并跨s。If the control is in a , the can be repositioned within the and across s. 属性将被忽略，并且如果属性是`false`，大小为将随着项被添加到。The property is ignored, and if the property is `false`, the size of the grows as items are added to the . 通常情况下，不参与 tab 键顺序。Typically, the does not participate in the tab order. > [!NOTE] > 和属性是互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置常见的语法属性，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来使控件有机会处理助记键字符。The method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 此方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态以及给定的字符是否表示助记键。This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 通常使用此方法的实现方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 这种默认实现方法只返回`false`，以指示该控件具有没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`参数由容器风格的控件。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 当`directed`参数设置为`true`、`forward`参数进行计算以确定哪个控件进行选择。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 当`forward`设置为`true`，则在 tab 键顺序中的下一步控件被选定; 时`false`，选择上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法激活的控件，如果控件的样式位设置为`true`，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。The method activates the control if the control's style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到方法通过进行筛选后的方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的函数文档位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以处理操作系统消息中标识结构。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中了解另一个应用程序变为活动状态，以便处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用信息， ，和值，请参阅平台 SDK 文档参考位于 MSDN 库http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For information about the available , , and values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 在平台 SDK （核心 SDK 部分） 下载，还可以在 MSDN 中包含的 windows.h 标头文件中找不到实际的常量值。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN. para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的方法来处理它们不处理任何消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
